title: Peter Nam (Founder of Gunther Werks)
description:
Peter Nam is the Founder and CEO of Gunther Werks, a company that turns 993 Porsches into carbon fiber bodied speed machines. Matt talks to Peter about how he got started, why he chose the 993, and all the challenges that come with building such a car. 

 

https://www.guntherwerks.com/

@guntherwerks 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Watch the show: https://youtu.be/ePglcpaN24A
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
